column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ (Preliminary information) At 11:26 a.m. on September 26
column5: there was another fire at N8 nightclub/restaurant in Sangkat Tuot Svay Prey II
column8: the authorities are intervening with several fire trucks to put out the fire.------The exact cause of the fire at the club is still unknown.------The ------same location was on fire just 3 days ago on September 23------
column9: when a blaze broke out on the roof.------UPDATE: The fire was caused by welders who were fixing the roof after the previous fire.------UPDATE: Two Chinese nationals were arrested in connection with the fire. One was seriously injured jumping from the building.
